p: Epidemiological data from the epidemics of SARS-CoV in 2003â€“2004 and MERS-CoV in 2014 showed a similar sex-related pattern independent of age [ 3]. Although the US currently has the largest number of confirmed cases of COVID-19 worldwide, the latest update from the Centers for Disease Control does not provide any sex-specific data regarding prevalence or mortality related to COVID-19. This is an important observation which deserves a pause to reflect upon and identify some potential reasons.
